reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress comfortable and perfect for weddings, with a nice fit and good style. The material quality receives mixed feedback, with some praising the fabric while others find it thin and t-shirt-like. The color accuracy and sizing also get mixed reviews - while some like the color, others find it off, and while some say the size is perfect, others report it being too large. The length receives criticism for being too short. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I want every color !!!!
items.body: I love this collection I have about 4 of these fandee dresses blue,black, black, gray and white, and a flower one and they are so beautiful and elegant I can even wear it to church and being 7 months pregnant and they still fit so good because they have a lot of stretch in them. Read more
items.author: Yaquelin

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous
items.body: I‚Äôm a wedding officiant, and like to wear something very classy in a solid color. I got this dress in the Deep Blue. The color is much more vibrant in person than in the photo. I wore the dress yesterday to officiate a wedding, and received loads of compliments. The dress is very comfortable, flattering, AND it has pockets! I‚Äôm 5‚Äô2‚Äù, 135 lbs, and I bought the small. Fit was perfect, though a little long. I wore silver heels, about 3‚Äù, and that made everything perfect. Read more
items.author: EMFM

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect!
items.body: Perfect fit! Loved it! Read more
items.author: Monee J

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful but not consistent in material and length.
items.body: This dress is beautiful . I ordered in 2 different sizes: medium for me which was too short it ddnt look right but the shape of the dress is really pretty. I gave it to my mom who‚Äôs 4‚Äô8‚Äù and the length was perfect for her. I‚Äôm 5‚Äô6‚Äù. The xs I ordered for my gramma who‚Äôs shorter than I am but taller than my mom and the dress was a little too long (it was dragging on the floor) - I think the length of the xs would have fit me perfect but it‚Äôs not my size so it would be too tight. Also the fabric of the xs was different than the medium size. I ordered this dress before in green and the fabric was similar to the medium but the fabric of the xs was different‚Ä¶. Still very pretty and the shape of the dress was the same but the fabric was different. I really love how the medium sizes fit me I just wish they were a little longer in length Read more
items.author: Aaliyah

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A pretty girl must ‚ù§Ô∏è
items.body: Hey guys!!! It‚Äôs Bo Bina with another pretty girl review. Lawd hunny prepare yourself for the compliments with this beauty. I ordered this dress for a company Christmas party and this dress was a hit for me. If you‚Äôre built like me with a small waist and hips then stop reading this and order the darn dress ü§£üòÇü§£. But to all my pretty girls this can be very flattering on all of us. The color is spot on, the flow is amazing. I didn‚Äôt get hot while dancing because the fabric is light and not thick. The dress was overall comfy. No pulling, tugging or adjusting for a 4 and a half hour event. I had no issues with see throughs and the stretch is every woman‚Äôs dream. That‚Äôs why this dress is a 5 star ‚≠êÔ∏è from me. So in all I would definitely recommend this dress to anyone. Get it and stay pretty my loves. ü•∞ Read more
items.author: Amzamine F.

items.body: Dress fit perfectly. Compliments throogh the roof. Very comfortable. True to size Read more

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Dress
items.body: Says floor length, I even went by my height.. Nope styli to short, but it‚Äôs an ok dress Read more
items.author: Cindy Johnson

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Accurate Color, Small Fit, Breathable Fabric.
items.body: My first order was pre-worn with deodorant stains and no tie, but I returned it and got a brand new vacuum-sealed one, though I ordered both as "new". Check before trying on. Color is accurate, and it comes with the sash. The fabric is light and breathable which is good for me. As for the fit, I'd recommend ordering one size up if you don't know your measurements. It's not see through, which I was worried about. The texture means outlines are visible on the tighter parts. It is pretty stretchy but - as mentioned above - it doesn't cover any flaws if it's too small. (Picture is of another bridesmaid, who is 5'6" in an XL.) Read more
items.author: Anne

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: 3-candy, Orange, 2-purple, 3-purple, Rose Red, Lake Blue, Leaf Green, Purple Blending, 3-red, Lavender, 1-white, 3-black, Light Pink, Green Blending. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
